messages.subject: MIW New Beginnings help once again
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone I again am looking for more replies to the New Beginnings situation.  It is as follows: I am going to start a new job in two weeks.  My baby is
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone

I again am looking for more replies to the New Beginnings situation. It
is as follows:

I am going to start a new job in two weeks. My baby is nine months old
and stays with her dad during the day, as he works the night shift.
With my old job, he brought the baby to work at lunch so I only needed
to pump once in the morning. I am uncertain how to broach this
breastfeeding/pumping subject with my new manager. How do I let my
manager know that my pumping will not affect my work, and how do I talk
to him about the daily visits from my husband and infant?

Send the responses to my email (joylyn@...). Also, replies
become the property of LLLI and are subject to editing. :-) Please
including your full postal address (full name, street address, city,
state, and zip)--we only publish your name and city, but we need the
rest to send you a copy of the magazine.

Thank you so much!

Joylyn
